original_title: Israel launches attack on Gaza City — RT World News
article_summary: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz faces opposition from coalition partners over his plan to send troops to Ukraine, with the Social Democratic Party only supporting the move if the US leads. The potential deployment raises legal and strategic questions, and Trump has signaled willingness to offer air support if hostilities end. Meanwhile, an Italian police arrest of a Ukrainian man suspected of involvement in the Nord Stream pipeline sabotage is linked to the ongoing Russia-Ukraine conflict.</s>
